column2: Nestin-TVA; Ink4af/f; H11LSL-Cas9 f/f; CIC f/f (OligoNation C)
Nestin-TVA; Ink4af/f; H11LSL-Cas9 f/f; CIC f/f
Looked hunched and weak like 21724 did the previous day when it died. Like 21724, it also still looked like it had groomed fur.
Lots of fluid on the brain when the skull was opened, the brain sort of deflated
Fixed the brain in 10% NBF overnight and the next day transferred to 70% EtOH in a 50mL conical.
Virus was added in a 1:1 ratio with 10^6 cells total per pup in 5uL.
